page.title: 07Sports facilities in Hampton
page.content: In{Hampton-in-Arden}there is a {Sports Club}on a sharp bend on Shadow Brook Lane. The club offers 4 sports _ {hockey, soccer, squash}and{tennis.} They have a bar which sells drinks, crisps and peanuts, and have changing rooms and toilets. The tennis courts are all-weather but get slippery when it's wet. There are 3 courts and one umpire's chair. The junior members have an American Tournament about every 2 months and whoever gets the most games wins. There are 2 squash courts, with places for spectators. They have their own hockey and soccer teams which play other clubs within the area. There is also a{Cricket Club}off Meriden Road, Hampton. It arranges regular fixtures throughout the summer against other teams from within Warwickshire and the West Midlands.
